channel.title: When i try to ban a player it disconects them on trisidiaxv3 base
channel.description: errm when i try to ban a player it dissconects then i added a getid command and it reconnects again.. so i think i need to try and solve this problem so that i can make everything working perfectly. or will ahve a ahrd time

item.dc:creator: @serversdownload serversdownload
item.description:
@serversdownload wrote:

you don’t underrstand but if i use any bann comand it recconects but i can ban using ::ban-name-seconds but i want to find out the reason i added command ::getid then it reconnects get’s annyonig so i need to find problem

item.source: When i try to ban a player it disconects them on trisidiaxv3 base

item.title: When i try to ban a player it disconects them on trisidiaxv3 base
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("banuser") && c.playerRights >= 3 && playerCommand.charAt(7) == ' ') { // use as ::ban name
			try {	
				String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(8);
				Connection.addNameToBanList(playerToBan);
				Connection.addNameToFile(playerToBan);
				for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
					if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
						if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) {
							Server.playerHandler.players[i].disconnected = true;
						} 
					}
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Online.");
			}
		}

Read full topic
